QuestData.Title: An Ancient Legend
QuestData.Description: My father has dedicated his life to studying the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.$B$BThe Vale is a mythical place, sealed after the Pandaren revolution twelve thousand years ago. We know so little about it!$B$BMy father followed a trail of clues to the cave down the hill, seeking a very old poem known as the Song of the Vale, but he is in no condition to retrieve it. It is guarded by some sort of ancestor spirit.$B$BIf you are heading that way anyway, would you mind bringing it back to him?
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve the Song of the Vale from the Den of Sorrow.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh... it is the poem! Did you... read it? What did you learn about the Vale?
